metadata.title: CVE-2021-28658 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In Django 2.2 before 2.2.20, 3.0 before 3.0.14, and 3.1 before 3.1.8,MultiPartParser allowed directory traversal via uploaded files withsuitably crafted file names. Built-in upload handlers were not affected bythis vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28658` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.5').
